name: @ivuorinen/actions
description: GitHub Actions monorepo with 40 reusable actions

scripts.lint: npm run lint:markdown && npm run lint:yaml && npm run lint:actions
scripts.format: npm run format:prettier && npm run format:tables
scripts.docs: echo 'Generating documentation for all actions...' && find . -mindepth 2 -maxdepth 2 -name 'action.yml' -exec dirname {} \; | xargs -I {} sh -c 'npx action-docs --source={}/action.yml --no-banner --include-name-header > {}/README.md'

author: Ismo Vuorinen
